tweet: Thank you, Mr. President, for showing your appreciation to our heroic defenders on behalf of all of us! https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1078202245123096577 …

I'm very happy to share my annual #Christmas message to all of my constituents throughout Western #PA. May God bless you all, and may He bless and protect our entire country as we celebrate this joyous holiday season! #MerryChristmas! #HappyHolidays #PA03 #PA16 pic.twitter.com/hTweqO7i2F

Last December, Congress passed historic tax reform that put more money back in the American people’s pockets. 12 months later, we've passed another major reform bill to help Americans save that money for the years when they need it most!  https://kelly.house.gov/press-release/house-passes-kelly-legislation-increase-retirement-savings-americans … #HR88 #Retirement pic.twitter.com/f3RQU8IL2P

Very proud to see #Erie & @ErieDDC leading the way with #OpportunityZones and setting a standard for our entire nation to follow! This new program — created by the historic #TaxCutsAndJobsAct — will spur new investments, economic growth & job creation throughout our region! #PA16 https://twitter.com/GoErie/status/1074968035637714945 …

Rural families in Western #PA received a tractor-load of good news from Washington this week!
